General.Name: Guangxi Guidong Eletric Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Energy Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the power generation and supply business in China. The company generates electricity through hydro, thermal, and new energy sources. It also engages in the real estate and water supply businesses, as well as sells oil products. The company was formerly known as Guangxi Guidong Electric Power Co., Ltd. Guangxi Energy Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Hezhou, China.
